1	制大黄		TCMID_H_6512			ZHI DA HUANG	Radix et Rhizoma Rhei Praeparata	Plant medicine				寒	Cold	苦	Bitter	脾、大肠、胃、肝、心	Spleen,Large Intestine,Stomach,Liver,Heart	治疗便秘发热、大便潴留、腹痛、痢疾、湿热黄疸、呕血、鼻出血、血热眼肿、腹痛阑尾炎、疖疮脓肿，血瘀闭经，外伤，上消化道出血。烫伤外用伯恩斯。拉迪克塞特大黄（酒炒）眼睛发炎，喉咙肿大，牙龈肿痛。大黄（制）有疖、疮、脓肿。大黄（炭化）血瘀血瘀。	Treatment of fever with constipation, retention of the feces and abdominal pain, dysentery with inadequate discharge from the bowels, jaundice caused by damp-heat, haematemesis, epistaxis, inflammation of eye and swelling of the throat due to heat in the blood, appendicitis with abdominal pain, boils, sores and abscess, amenorrhea due to blood stasis, traumatic injuries, hemorrhage from the upper gastrointestinal tract. External use for scalds and burns.Radixet Rhizoma Rhei (stir-fried with wine)  Inflammation of the eye, swelling of the throat and painful swelling of the gums.  Radix et Rhizoma Rhei (prepared) Boils, sores and abscess.  Radix et Rhizoma Rhei (carbonized) Hemorrhage with blood stasis due to heat in the blood.				1. Sennoside A is the component for purgation.2. Promoting biliary secretion and enhancing the amount of bilirubin and bile acid.3. Rhein and Emodin exert bacteriostatic effect by inhibting the synthesis of DNA, RNA and protein in bacteria4. Emodin is a component for hypotensive5. Oral use of its extract reduces the raio of serum cholesterol and total phospholipid in rabbits with hypercholesterolemia.6. Chrysophanol, an other active component, exerts a hemostatic effect.	itcm_h_1

The dietary fiber of cow pedicle can promote large intestine peristalsis, help defecation, lower cholesterol in the body, reduce the accumulation of toxins and wastes in the body, and have the function of preventing and treating constipation. (2) The effect of lowering blood pressure. The burdock glycosides contained in burdock root can dilate blood vessels and lower blood pressure. (3) Antibacterial effect. Burdock contains antibacterial ingredients, mainly anti-Staphylococcus aureus, the minimum inhibitory concentration is 4000μg/ml. (4) hypoglycemic effect. Bovine pedicle contains inulin, and its water extract can significantly and lastingly reduce blood sugar in rats and increase carbohydrate tolerance. (5) Diuretic and laxative effects. Arctium has mild diuretic and laxative effects, and can cause mild tail-lifting reaction in mice. (6) Anti-tumor effect. Arctium has anticancer effect, can inhibit the activity of phosphofructosylase in cancer cells, and arctigenin also has anticancer activity. (7) The effect of treating nephritis. 7919	大红袍					DA?HONG?PAO	Camellia sinensis (L.) O.Kuntze	Plant medicine	山茶科	Camellia								提神醒脑，健胃消食，明目益思	Refreshing the mind, invigorating stomach and digestion, improving eyesight and thinking				1. Exciting effect: The caffeine in tea can excite the central nervous system, help people to invigorate their spirits, improve their thinking, eliminate fatigue and improve work efficiency. 2. Diuretic effect: caffeine and theophylline in tea have diuretic effect and are used to treat edema and water stagnation. The detoxification and diuretic effects of black tea and sugar water can be used to treat acute jaundice hepatitis. 3. Strengthen the heart and relieve spasm: Caffeine has the effect of strengthening the heart, relieving spasm, and relaxing smooth muscle, can relieve bronchospasm, and promote blood circulation. It is a good auxiliary drug for the treatment of bronchial asthma, cough and phlegm, and myocardial infarction. 4. Inhibition of arteriosclerosis: Tea polyphenols and vitamin C in tea have the effect of promoting blood circulation and removing blood stasis to prevent arteriosclerosis. Therefore, among people who drink tea regularly, the incidence of hypertension and coronary heart disease is lower. 5. Antibacterial and antibacterial effects: Tea polyphenols and tannic acid in tea act on bacteria, which can coagulate the protein of bacteria and kill bacteria. It can be used to treat intestinal diseases, such as cholera, typhoid, dysentery, enteritis, etc. If the skin is sore, festering and oozing pus, and the skin is broken by trauma, rinse the affected area with strong tea, which has anti-inflammatory and bactericidal effects. Oral inflammation, ulceration, and sore throat can also be treated with tea. 6. Weight loss effect: Various compounds such as caffeine, inositol, folic acid, pantothenic acid and aromatic substances in tea can regulate fat metabolism, especially oolong tea has a good decomposition effect on protein and fat. Tea polyphenols and vitamin C can reduce cholesterol and blood lipids, so drinking tea can lose weight. 7. Anti-caries effect: tea contains fluorine, fluoride ion has a great affinity with the calcium of teeth, and can become a kind of "fluorapatite" which is more insoluble in acid, just like adding a protection to teeth layer, which improves the ability of teeth to resist acid and caries. 8. Inhibition of cancer cells: According to reports, flavonoids in tea have different degrees of anti-cancer effects in vitro, and the stronger ones are vitexine, morin and catechin. 9. Helps to lower lipids and aid digestion. The caffeine in tea can increase the secretion of gastric juice, which can help digestion and enhance the ability to break down fat. The so-called "eating for a long time makes you thin" is here. 10. Helps to protect teeth and eyesight. The high content of fluoride in tea is beneficial for preventing dental caries, protecting teeth, and strengthening teeth. The vitamin C and other ingredients in tea can reduce the turbidity of the eye lens, and drinking tea regularly has a positive effect on reducing eye diseases, protecting eyes and improving eyesight.	itcm_h_7919

It turns blue when it encounters iron. It is similar to tannin. It used to be called "coffee tannin", but unlike tannin, it does not precipitate protein, so it has no astringent effect. Caffeic acid and chlorogenic acid have a wide range of antibacterial effects, but they can be inactivated by protein in vivo. Chlorogenic acid, similar to caffeine, can increase the central excitability of rats by oral or intraperitoneal injection.	itcm_h_8003

8028	雪胆					XUE DAN	H. dolichocarpa、H. omeiensis、H. gigantha、H. sphaerocarpa、H.?chinensis	Plant medicine	葫芦科	Cucurbitaceae		寒	Cold	苦	Bitter			清热解毒，消炎杀菌，健胃止痛。	Clearing away heat and detoxifying, anti-inflammatory and sterilizing, strengthening stomach and relieving pain.				1. Antibacterial effect: Saponin and bittern (ie mixed crystal of snow bile) have different degrees of antibacterial effect on Shigella freundii, hemolytic streptococcus, Staphylococcus aureus, Salmonella choleraesuis, etc. in vitro, and the effective concentration is 0.1μg/ml, the effect is similar to or stronger than chloramphenicol. It also has bacteriostatic effect on typhoid bacillus and Escherichia coli at the concentration of 10-100μg/ml. 2. Antibacterial effect: Snow bile and snow bile saponins have different degrees of inhibitory effects on Shigella flexneri, Bacillus typhi, and Salmonella choleraesuis in vitro. It is clinically used to treat bacillary dysentery, acute enteritis and tonsillitis and other inflammatory diseases with good results. 3. Antipyretic effect: Intravenous injection of 40mg/kg (intraperitoneal injection) of snow bilirubin A has a mild antipyretic effect on the fever caused by the injection of typhoid and paratyphoid A mixed vaccine in rabbits, but it has a mild antipyretic effect on normal body temperature and non-bacterial fever. No obvious effect. When the dose is 20 ~ 40mg/kg, conduction block occurs, and finally the heart stops. 4. Effects on cardiovascular system: total saponins can increase coronary flow and reduce myocardial oxygen consumption in mice. It has antihypertensive effect on anesthetized dogs. Clinically, it has good curative effect in the treatment of coronary heart disease when combined with Dioscorea chuanlongi and Sophora japonica.	itcm_h_8028

Lac			It contains 74.5% of insect glue, 4 to 6% of wax, 6.5% of pigment, 9.5% of inclusions such as insect body and wood chips, and 3.5% of moisture. 8266	云芝多糖					YUN ZHI DUO TANG			多孔菌科	Polyporaceae											Coriolus versicolor polysaccharide		1. Improve the immune function of the body: The polysaccharide of Yunzhi bacteria can enhance the phagocytosis of mouse peritoneal macrophages. Yunzhi polysaccharide (PSK) has a certain therapeutic effect on the immunocompromised mice caused by one-time irradiation with 60Co 200γ. It can significantly increase the serum lysozyme content and spleen index of irradiated mice, which is considered to have a promoting effect on the non-specific immune function of macrophages. 2. Anti-tumor effect: Yunzhi polysaccharide (PSK) has inhibitory effect on sarcoma S180, leukemia L1210 and adenocarcinoma AI755. 3. Anti-atherosclerotic effect: Experiments show that Yunzhi polysaccharide (PSK) can effectively inhibit the formation and development of atherosclerotic plaques. 4. Effects on the central nervous system: Yunzhi polysaccharide (PSK) can improve the learning and memory function of mice and rats, and has a significant improvement effect on the learning and memory impairment of scopolamine-induced rats.	itcm_h_8266
